page.title: 04EVENTS - Lydham/More
page.content:
{Church Events. }Special services at Christmas, Easter and Harvest. { {Community Events }--Annual Fete-- to raise money for parishes and village hall. Attended by majority living in area. Result of 1984 Fete at Linley Hall: Â£1367.
--Children's Party-- with tea and games. Held round Easter in Village Hall for all children under 11 in the 3 local parishes (i.e. Lydham,More and Snead) Number invited in 1985: 38. Funds for this raised by local W.I. at {Annual Christmas Fair }held in November.
Teams from Lydham and More take part in the annual{Parishes' Cricket Match against other local parishes.
